title: From the barrios of Texas to the White House, the amazing story of Rebecca Contreras
itunes:title: From the barrios of Texas to the White House, the amazing story of Rebecca Contreras
description: Rebecca Contreras served as an executive and chief advisory to the Secretary in the role of Deputy Assistant Secretary and Chief Human Capital Officer at the U.S. Department of Treasury.  She also served as a Member on the government-wide Chief Human Capital Officer’s Council advising Congress and the President on Workforce issues. Prior to that she served as a Commissioned Officer in the White House as Special Assistant for Personnel to President George W. Bush.

Prior to that she served as a Commissioned Officer in the White House as Special Assistant for Personnel to President George W. Bush.
